name: peacocking
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaviour by men that shows they are very proud of their appearance, for example wearing clothes that make people notice them: Peacocking is something men do to highlight their strong points and stand out from their competition. Once upon a time any peacocking would have been for my benefit.
More examplesFewer examplesI also played a lot of hurling and football, so I think my peacocking was tolerated. In the pickup world, this sartorial differentiation is known as "peacocking" and can involve wild tops, garish boots, or loud hats.When I visited a village in Bangladesh, peacocking (wearing outlandish attire to stand out) still worked.
